ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotics:\nSimple Logic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tier 1: Investigation into the production of the Simple Robotic Matrix units used in producing Amateur-class robots. Unlocks Basic robotic research (Tier 2) and the Simple Robotic Matrix.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotics:\nBasic Logic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tier 2: Investigation into the production of the Basic Robotic Matrix units used in producing Professional-class robots. Unlocks Intermediate robotic research (Tier 3) and the Basic Robotic Matrix unit. All robots in this tier are faster and less flammable than the previous.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotics:\nIntermediate Logic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tier 3: Investigation into the production of the Intermediate Robotic Matrix units used in producing Master-class robots. Unlocks advanced robotic research (Tier 4) and the Intermediate Robotic Matrix unit. All robots in this tier are faster and less flammable than the previous.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotics:\nAdvanced Logic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tier 4: Investigation into the production of the Advanced Robotic Matrix units used in producing System-Master-class robots. Unlocks the Advanced Robotic Matrix unit. All robots in this tier are faster and less flammable than the previous.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotics:\nAnti-Logic\n(NP=P)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tier 5: Break the boundaries set by existing levels of technology, understandings of logic, and the very concepts of causation. Our scientific horizons are becoming a lot more timey-wimey.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotics:\nFundamentals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tier 0:\nInvestigation into the easiest principles of robotics and automation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cleaner
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of cleaning robots. The Hauling and Cleaning bots are faster than all other bots of the same tier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hauler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of Hauling robots. The Hauling and Cleaning bots are faster than all other bots of the same tier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Anti-Logic\nOmniBot
ResearchProjectDef.description: Production of omni-talented robots. These super-sonic robots are capable of almost any task.
